name: JS comments replacing
content:
var test = [
      "// Code",
      '// Code',
      "'// Code",
      '"// Code',
      //" Comment",
      //' Comment',
      /* Comment */
      // Comment /* Comment
      /* Comment
       Comment // */ "Code",
      "Code",
      "/* Code */",
      "/* Code",
      "Code */",
      '/* Code */',
      '/* Code',
      'Code */',
      /* Comment
      "Comment",
      Comment */ "Code",
      /Code\/*/,
      "Code */"
  ]
author: Bart Kiers
